achievements.title: What Is This Stuff, Anyway?
achievements.text: Defeat The Experiment using the Alchemical Concoction in “Extracurricular Activities”.

achievements.title: No Void For You
achievements.text: Complete “The Miskatonic Museum” without ever defeating the Hunting Horror.

achievements.title: First Rule of Arkham
achievements.text: Burn The Necronomicon in “The Miskatonic Museum.”

achievements.title: All Aboard
achievements.text: Complete “The Essex County Express” without letting any Helpless Passengers leave play.

achievements.title: The Gang’s All Here
achievements.text: In “The Survivors,” the following characters survived The Dunwich Legacy:

achievements.title: No Brood Left Behind
achievements.text: Have no Broods of Yog-Sothoth escape into the wild in “Undimensioned and Unseen.”

achievements.title: Remind Me Not To Piss Her Off
achievements.text: Defeat either version of Seth Bishop while Naomi O’Bannion is under your control.

achievements.title: Beyond What Veil?
achievements.text: Take 10 damage from Beyond the Veil without being defeated.

achievements.title: Here We Go Again
achievements.text: Have Dr. Henry Armitage, Dr. Francis Morgan, and Professor Warren Rice in play at the same time.

achievements.title: Bird Hunting
achievements.text: Defeat 3 Whippoorwills in a single turn.

achievements.title: They Aren’t Getting Away With This
achievements.text: Win The Dunwich Legacy campaign as “Ashcan” Pete with Duke listed under “Sacrificed to Yog-Sothoth.”

achievements.title: Tabula Rasa
achievements.text: Win The Dunwich Legacy campaign with no [tablet] or [elder_thing] tokens in the chaos bag.

achievements.title: Line in the Sand
achievements.text: Win The Dunwich Legacy campaign with at least three Ultimatums active.

achievements.title: Dunwich Expertise
achievements.text: Win The Dunwich Legacy campaign on Expert difficulty.
